#define EXCEPTION_RAISE(EXCEPTION, MSG)   throw Exception( EXCEPTION, MSG, __FILE__, __LINE__, __FUNCTION__)
 Utility macro for throwing exceptions, automatically including the necessary file, line, and function information. The user need only supply the exception name and error message.
